alert.note: Alert for Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 3:21PM CDT until May 18 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KIMBALL AND SOUTHEASTERN LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 221 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Albin to near Pine Bluffs to near Panorama Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kimball, Pine Bluffs, Oliver Campground, Oliver Reservoir, Kimball Airport, Panorama Point and Bushnell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 397 and 402. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 1 and 20. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
